casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Kyle BERRY. No. 389A01-3. Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 20, 2006. Marilyn G. Ozer, William F.W. Massengale, Chapel Hill, for Kyle Berry. William N. Farrell, Senior Deputy Attorney General, Joan Cunningham, Assistant Attorney General, Ben David, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 17th day of February 2006 by Attorney General for Extension of Time to File Response to Motion for Appropriate Relief:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 20th day of February 2006."
